page.title: 15Entertainment.
page.content: Eastbourne has a wide selection of { {cinemas}and {theatres}including the {Congress,Tivoli,Royal Hippodrome}and the {Devonshire Park.} These theatres and shows are popular attractions for holidaymakers. Many famous stars come to Eastbourne for the summer season. This year at the Hippodrome {Ken Goodwin}will be starring in a show called "showtime '85" (tickets Â£3.20, Â£2.90, Â£2.10 and Â£1.70) The {Philharmonia Orchestra}will be holding a concert at the Congress where there will also be a circus. Starring at the Devonshire Park is { {Pat Phoenix}in Agatha Christie's "Spider's Web). Plays at the Tivoli are Joe Orton's farce "What the butler saw" & "Androcles & the Lion" by The Tickled Pink Theatre Co.
